text: jab tum ganeematon ko praapt karane ke lie unakee or chaloge to peechhe rahanevaale kahenge, "hamen bhee anumati dee jae ki ham tumhaare saath chale." ve chaahate hai ki allaah ka kathan ko badal de. kah dena, "tum hamaare saath kadaapi nahin chal sakate. allaah ne pahale hee aisa kah diya hai." isapar ve kahenge, "nahin, balki tum hamase eershya kar rahe ho." nahin, balki ve log samajhate thode hee hai
